author: Galactica
post_text: August 14, 2020 at 10:35 AM#1Hello all,I was looking for help with a macro to create a sequence, ideally with pop ups asking ie:"What seq number?""What ch?""What cue number?""Label cue number xyz"Thanks in advance

posts.author: Galactica
posts.post_text: August 14, 2020 at 10:35 AM#1Hello all,I was looking for help with a macro to create a sequence, ideally with pop ups asking ie:"What seq number?""What ch?""What cue number?""Label cue number xyz"Thanks in advance

posts.author: scoobytoobins
posts.post_text: August 14, 2020 at 3:07 PM#2setvar $seqnumber = (seq number?)store seq $seqnumber==not sure what you mean by ch? channel?==setvar $cuenumber = (cue number?)store seq $seqnumber cue $cuenumbersetvar $cuename = ("cue name?")label seq $seqnumber $"cuename"setvar $seqnumber = ""setvar $cuenumber = ""setvar $cuename = ""haven't checked this but it'll be something like this.

posts.author: Galactica
posts.post_text: August 14, 2020 at 3:13 PM#3i'll give it a try. Thanks Kai

posts.post_text: August 17, 2020 at 7:35 PM#4Or without variables:- Store Sequence (what sequence number?) Cue (what cue number?) ("label for cue?")
